author: Kate Palmer
title: Budget 2015: how new '10pc' peer-to-peer Isas will work
text: Savings Budget 2015: how new '10pc' peer-to-peer Isas will work Government unveils 'Innovative Finance Isa' for peer-to-peer savings and crowdfunding investments - we detail what will (and won't) be included Vicky Gilbertson currently has Â£11,000 lent out with Zopa, which she hopes will eventually pay for her two sons' university costs. Tom is seven and Alfie is five Photo: Paul Cooper
